inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('DualWieldAttack', 'Stackable', 10); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('DualWieldStrDamage', 'Stackable', 1); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Dual Wielding Mastery
description: You gain an additional +10 bonus to attack and a +1 damage bonus per point of Strength above 10 while Dual Wielding.
